name: tsv4
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool odam.
Tool description: ODAM
API description: Retrieves the entry list of a specified subset from a dataset using the odem API.

subset.description: The identifier of the data subset to retrieve.

dataset.description: The identifier of the dataset to query.

format.description: The output format for the response. Defaults to 'tsv'.
